overview_of_class:
Continuation of 290-1. Continuation of linear algebra Euclidean space. Multivariable differential calculus. Students may not receive credit for both 240 and 290-1; 230 and 290-2; or 234 and 290-3. Prerequisites: one year of calculus (usually in high school) and consent of the department.

THIS COURSE HAS MANDATORY EVENING MIDTERM EXAMINATIONS FROM 630-730 PM ON MONDAY, FEB 1ST and MONDAY, FEB 29TH. PLEASE CHECK THE REGISTRAR'S WEBPAGE FOR DETAILS: http://www.registrar.northwestern.edu/registration/midterms.html

This exam takes precedence over scheduled meetings of other classes, including labs and discussion sections, held at this time, and it is up to the student to make arrangements for handling conflicts arising from such meetings. In special circumstances, arrangements for dealing with other unavoidable conflicts can be made by alerting the course coordinator at least two weeks ahead of time; he/she will decide if your conflict can be accommodated.
name: MENU: Linear Algebra and Multivariable Calculus
subject: MATH
